response.overview: "Ayshamgul " chronicles the growth and changes of the rural teenager Abduwaly from the age of 12 to 18. Due to "special circumstances", Abduwaly was unable to attend school. Despite the seemingly dull life, Abduwaly had his own imaginary world of dreams, and the Ayshamgul who always accompanied him did not exist. As time passed, facing real life, Abduwaly eventually transformed from a carefree boy into a helpless man.
response.title: Ayshamgul
